entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
